duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with prospects in meaningful dialogue to understand their needs and convert them into satisfied clients.
Construct individualized financial and retirement plans tailored to client needs.
Foster and manage a broad and varied clientele.
Sustain open and honest communication with clients, cultivating resilient and enduring relationships.

education_certification.credential: Series 65 License (or the ability to secure within 60 days)
Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
